title: [3.116.1; MAUI x64 Android emulator] SkiaSharp does not draw lines and circles
body:
### Description

Line drawing (e.g. lines and circles) do not function on MAUI using SkiaSharp 3.116.1 when drawn on x64 Android emulator (x64). They do work in Xamarin (emulator or not, 2.88.8; ARM64 and x64) and in MAUI on Android real device (ARM64).

### Code

I was testing Android x64 behavior with my game GnollHack for use with Google Play Games on PC, but in fact using a local Pixel 7 emulator first.

### Expected Behavior

Lines are drawn on just like on real Android device using ARM64.

### Actual Behavior

Local x64 Android Pixel 7 emulator does not draw lines or circles, but most other things are drawn successfully.

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.116.0 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.8 (Deprecated)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

Android

### Platform / Operating System Version

Android 15

### Devices

Pixel 7 emulator.

### Relevant Screenshots

Map Auto-Center should have a circle around the relevant button and a line connecting the circle to the red text box.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/268c04b4-f4ac-44b7-afa9-7cae53414715)
